entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 09:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: S 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 09:26 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 09:26 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:26 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 09:26 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 09:26 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 09:26 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
